sentences.en: An infinitive is a two-word form of a verb.

sentences.en: The infinitive construction is a language phenomenon which often appears in English.

sentences.en: The infinitive, being one of the non - finite verbs, occupies an important place in the English grammar.

trans.tran_en: in grammar, the basic form of a verb, used with ‘to’ in English. In the sentence ‘I want to watch television.’ ‘to watch’ is an infinitive.
